title: Sunday In New York
description: Harry Steele is offered the job of a lifetime, a Directorship, and no-one is happier than his wife, Alison.Harry knew he should have accepted the job the day it was offered, but because he has reservations about the job, and the man who is offering it, he asks for a few days to think about it.In those few days, his whole life is turned inside out, where his belief of everyone and everything is about to be shattered, and none more so than by the woman he loves more than anything else in the world, his wife, Alison.
author: Charles Heath
